mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.notice_no AS "noticeNo", a.goods_date AS "goodsDate", a.first_date AS "firstDate", a.custom_name AS "contractSales.extField1", a.build_unit AS "buildUnit", a.receive_unit AS "receiveUnit", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.task_count AS "taskCount", a.hetong_accmeth AS "hetongAccmeth", a.kind_name AS "docBeton.kindName", a.build_site AS "buildSite", a.water_meth AS "docWatermeth.watermethName", a.locale_dispatch AS "docOfficework.officeworkName", a.beng_name AS "docPump.pumpName", a.distance AS "distance", a.project_addr AS "projectAddr", a.contact AS "contact", a.special_require AS "specialRequire", a.concrete_name AS "concreteName", a.produce_dispatch AS "produceDispatch", a.check_person AS "checkPerson", a.cancle_person AS "canclePerson", a.make_date AS "makeDate", a.check_date AS "checkDate", a.cancel_date AS "cancelDate", a.salesman AS "salesman", a.slumps AS "slumps", a.status AS "status", a.notice_flag AS "noticeFlag", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce_design( notice_no, goods_date, first_date, custom_name, build_unit, receive_unit, goods_count, task_count, hetong_accmeth, kind_name, build_site, water_meth, locale_dispatch, beng_name, distance, project_addr, contact, special_require, concrete_name, produce_dispatch, check_person, cancle_person, make_date, check_date, cancel_date, salesman, slumps, status, notice_flag, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{noticeNo}, #{goodsDate}, #{firstDate}, #{contractSales.extField1}, #{buildUnit}, #{receiveUnit}, #{goodsCount}, #{taskCount}, #{hetongAccmeth}, #{docBeton.kindName}, #{buildSite}, #{docWatermeth.watermethName}, #{docOfficework.officeworkName}, #{docPump.pumpName}, #{distance}, #{projectAddr}, #{contact}, #{specialRequire}, #{concreteName}, #{produceDispatch}, #{checkPerson}, #{canclePerson}, #{makeDate}, #{checkDate}, #{cancelDate}, #{salesman}, #{slumps}, #{status}, #{noticeFlag}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE produce_design SET notice_no = #{noticeNo}, goods_date = #{goodsDate}, first_date = #{firstDate}, custom_name = #{contractSales.extField1}, build_unit = #{buildUnit}, receive_unit = #{receiveUnit}, goods_count = #{goodsCount}, task_count = #{taskCount}, hetong_accmeth = #{hetongAccmeth}, kind_name = #{docBeton.kindName}, build_site = #{buildSite}, water_meth = #{docWatermeth.watermethName}, locale_dispatch = #{docOfficework.officeworkName}, beng_name = #{docPump.pumpName}, distance = #{distance}, project_addr = #{projectAddr}, contact = #{contact}, special_require = #{specialRequire}, concrete_name = #{concreteName}, produce_dispatch = #{produceDispatch}, check_person = #{checkPerson}, cancle_person = #{canclePerson}, make_date = #{makeDate}, check_date = #{checkDate}, cancel_date = #{cancelDate}, salesman = #{salesman}, slumps = #{slumps}, status = #{status}, notice_flag = #{noticeFlag}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
